events.message: The customer reported a car accident that occurred last night involving severe damage to the front bumper and hood.
The claim has been categorised under Auto Accident based on customer description of vehicle collision and extent of damages.
An experienced claims agent was assigned to handle the investigation and follow-up for this auto accident claim.
The customer was contacted to acknowledge the receipt of the claim and informed about the next steps in the process.
The insurance company requested additional documents including photos of the damaged vehicle and the police accident report.
The claimant submitted all requested documents promptly including the official police report and multiple pictures of the damaged car.
Investigation began to verify the circumstances of the accident and the extent of vehicle damage as per submitted documents.
The investigation was completed successfully, confirming the details of the collision and validating the claim for coverage.
A settlement offer covering the estimated repair costs and rental car expenses during the repair period was proposed to the customer.
The customer expressed satisfaction with the proposed settlement and appreciated the timely communication throughout the process.
The claim was officially approved, confirming the agreed settlement amount to cover all damages from the auto accident.
Payment was issued promptly to the customer's account to facilitate immediate repair services for the damaged vehicle.
The claim was closed after confirming that all payments were made and the customer was satisfied with the resolution.
All claim documentation and communications have been archived in the system for future reference and audit purposes.
